name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Ernest WHEELER, Appellant

judges: Before EAGEN, C. J., and O’BRIEN, ROBERTS, POMEROY, MANDERINO and LARSEN, JJ.

parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Ernest WHEELER, Appellant.

opinions.text:
OPINION OF THE COURT
PER CURIAM:
Judgment of sentence affirmed.
NIX, J., did not participate in the consideration or decision of this case.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: David S. Winston, Philadelphia, for appellant.
F. Emmett Fitzpatrick, Dist. Atty., Steven H. Goldblatt, Dep. Dist. Atty. for Law, Paul S. Diamond, Philadelphia, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
382 A.2d 740
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Ernest WHEELER, Appellant.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued Jan. 20, 1978.
Decided Feb. 10, 1978.
David S. Winston, Philadelphia, for appellant.
F. Emmett Fitzpatrick, Dist. Atty., Steven H. Goldblatt, Dep. Dist. Atty. for Law, Paul S. Diamond, Philadelphia, for appellee.
Before EAGEN, C. J., and O’BRIEN, ROBERTS, POMEROY, MANDERINO and LARSEN, JJ.
